### Literatur (Auswahl)

- Sebastian Sauer (2019): *Moderne Datenanalyse mit R.* Springer. [https://link.springer.com/book/10.1007/978-3-658-21587-3](https://link.springer.com/book/10.1007/978-3-658-21587-3)
- Mine &Ccedil;etinkaya-Rundel, Johanna Hardin (2021): *Introduction to Modern Statistics*, [https://openintro-ims.netlify.app/index.html](https://openintro-ims.netlify.app/index.html)
- Nicholas J. Horton, Randall Pruim, Daniel T. Kaplan (2018): Project MOSAIC Little Books *A Student's Guide to R*,  [https://github.com/ProjectMOSAIC/LittleBooks/raw/master/StudentGuide/MOSAIC-StudentGuide.pdf](https://github.com/ProjectMOSAIC/LittleBooks/raw/master/StudentGuide/MOSAIC-StudentGuide.pdf)

- Gareth James, Daniela Witten, Trevor Hastie, Robert Tibshirani (2023): *An Introduction to Statistical Learning -- with Applications in R*, [https://hastie.su.domains/ISLR2/ISLRv2_corrected_June_2023.pdf](https://hastie.su.domains/ISLR2/ISLRv2_corrected_June_2023.pdf)
